Module steurer.software_two
Package steurer.software_two.helper

Class Utilities

java.lang.Object
steurer.software_two.helper.Utilities
public abstract class Utilities extends Object
This is a helper class that stores instance variables that couldn't be stored in the actual FXML view, and methods that were reused across views.

    • onCloseShowForm

      private static void onCloseShowForm(javafx.stage.Stage stage, String onCloseRedirectFileName)
      This overrides the close request to close the application and redirects the user to the MainForm. LAMBDA EXPRESSION: In order to prevent the application from closing when the exit button is clicked, this uses a lambda expression to consume the event (i.e. the button being closed) and redirect the view to the desired FXML form.
      Parameters:
      stage - current stage

    • getLoader

      public static javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader getLoader(String fxmlFileName) throws IOException
      This gets and sets the FXML loader to be used with setStage after data is passed from one scene to another.
      Parameters:
      fxmlFileName - the filename for the scene to be loaded
      Returns:
      returns the loader
      Throws:
      IOException - throws exception if the loader fails to load

    • setStage

      public static void setStage(javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader loader, javafx.event.ActionEvent event, String onCloseRedirectFileName, boolean isMainMenu) throws IOException
      This takes the loader from getLoader, overrides the close request, and shows the new stage and scene.
      Parameters:
      loader - the loader generated from getLoader
      Throws:
      IOException

    • setStage

      public static void setStage(javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader loader, javafx.event.ActionEvent event, boolean isLogin) throws IOException
      This is designed for the login screen to take any event from any node type and set the stage. This allows someone to hit enter or click a button to proceed to the next screen.
      Parameters:
      loader - the loader generated from getLoader
      isLogin - overloads the previous setStage method
      Throws:
      IOException

    • showAlert

      public static void showAlert(javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType alertType, String message)
      This helps reduce the generation of alerts to one line of code.
      Parameters:
      alertType - the alert type
      message - the bundle label key that corresponds to the message to be displayed

      public static String getContactName(int contactID)

    • getContactID

      public static int getContactID(String contactName)
      Parameters:
      contactName - the contact name that needs to be matched to an ID
      Returns:
      if found, returns an integer, else returns -1

    • getUsername

      public static String getUsername(int userID)
      Parameters:
      userID - the user ID that needs to be matched to a username
      Returns:
      if found returns the username string, else returns null

    • getUserID

      public static int getUserID(String username)
      Parameters:
      username - the username that is to be matched with a user ID
      Returns:
      returns the user id if found; otherwise, returns -1

    • translate

      public static String translate(String bundleLabel)
      This uses the languageBundles resource bundle to translate text based upon the computer's locale.
      Parameters:
      bundleLabel - The key string for the desired value
      Returns:
      Returns the string in the resource bundle that corresponds to the bundleLabel.

    • getDivisionName

      public static String getDivisionName(int divisionID)
      Parameters:
      divisionID - The id of the desired division
      Returns:
      returns the name associated with the division id, else returns null

      Parameters:
